casebody.data:
Commonwealth v. Smith, Appellant. Argued September 18, 1970. Alan Klein, for appellant; Peter S. Greenberg, Assistant District Attorney, with him Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, J ames D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.

Order affirmed.
